testcase.name: Validating Logo
testcase.system-out: Given user launches application.............................................passed Given user launches application.............................................passed When user lands in home page and validate title "My Store"..................passed Then user should see my store logo..........................................passed

testcase.name: Search Item
testcase.system-out: Given user launches application.............................................passed And user enters product "blouse"............................................passed When user clicks search icon................................................passed Then item "blouse" is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.name: Contact Us Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user launches application.............................................passed And user clicks contact us button...........................................passed And user validates "CUSTOMER SERVICE - CONTACT US" is displayed.............passed And user chooses the subject heading "Customer service".....................passed And user enters email address...............................................passed And user enters order reference.............................................passed And user attaches file......................................................passed And user inputs message.....................................................passed And user clicks send button.................................................passed Then success message "Your message has been successfully sent to our team." should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Creating New User
testcase.system-out: Given user launches application.............................................passed When user clicks sign in button.............................................passed Then user should see create user section....................................passed And user enters valid email.................................................passed And clicks create button....................................................passed And user clicks title.......................................................passed And user enters firstname lastname and password............................passed And user selects date of birth..............................................passed And user enters valid company name..........................................passed And user enters address city................................................passed And user enters address city................................................passed And user selects state and enters zipcode...................................passed And user enters mobile phone................................................passed And user click register button..............................................passed
